title: surfreg
description: Performs surface registration (mris_register) between a subject and a target average subject based on the hemi.reg.template.tif atlas in the average subject.

target.title: Target
target.description: Target average subject to use as a registration target

reg_both.title: Both hemispheres registration flag
reg_both.description: Register both left and right hemispheres

no_annot.title: No annotations flag
no_annot.description: Do not use annot to rip

noneg.title: No negative flag
noneg.description: Option flag with unspecified behavior in the provided help text

init_reg.title: Initial registration name
init_reg.description: Initial registration name, default is sphere

lta.title: Affine registration
lta.description: Apply rotational components of affine registration

init_from_tal.title: Initialize from Talairach
init_from_tal.description: Use talaiach.xfm.lta for initial spherical registration

outsurf.title: Output surface name
outsurf.description: Output surface name, default depends on the target

no_set_vol_geom.title: No set volume geometry flag
no_set_vol_geom.description: Do not set volume geometry and center the sphere

threads.title: Threads
threads.description: Number of threads to run in parallel
